mapper.sql: ACHIEVEMENT_ID, ACHIEVEMENT_DESCR, EDUCATION_RESUME_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, CREATE_TIME, ACHIEVEMENT_NAME
mapper.insert: insert into tsc_achievement_desc (ACHIEVEMENT_ID, ACHIEVEMENT_DESCR, EDUCATION_RESUME_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, CREATE_TIME, ACHIEVEMENT_NAME) values (#{achievementId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{achievementDescr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{educationResumeId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{achievementName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into tsc_achievement_desc
ACHIEVEMENT_ID,
ACHIEVEMENT_DESCR,
EDUCATION_RESUME_ID,
START_DATE,
END_DATE,
CREATE_TIME,
ACHIEVEMENT_NAME,

mapper.update:
update tsc_achievement_desc
ACHIEVEMENT_DESCR = #{achievementDescr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EDUCATION_RESUME_ID = #{educationResumeId,jdbcType=CHAR},
START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE},
END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ACHIEVEMENT_NAME = #{achievementName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ACHIEVEMENT_ID = #{achievementId,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tsc_achievement_desc set ACHIEVEMENT_DESCR = #{achievementDescr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EDUCATION_RESUME_ID = #{educationResumeId,jdbcType=CHAR}, START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ACHIEVEMENT_NAME = #{achievementName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ACHIEVEMENT_ID = #{achievementId,jdbcType=CHAR}

update.foreach:
update tsc_achievement_desc
ACHIEVEMENT_DESCR = #{item.achievementDescr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EDUCATION_RESUME_ID = #{item.educationResumeId,jdbcType=CHAR},
START_DATE = #{item.startDate,jdbcType=DATE},
END_DATE = #{item.endDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CREATE_TIME = #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ACHIEVEMENT_NAME = #{item.achievementName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ACHIEVEMENT_ID = #{item.achievementId,jdbcType=CHAR}

mapper.insert:
insert into tsc_achievement_desc (ACHIEVEMENT_ID, ACHIEVEMENT_DESCR, EDUCATION_RESUME_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, CREATE_TIME, ACHIEVEMENT_NAME) values
(#{item.achievementId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.achievementDescr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.educationResumeId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.achievementName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
